About Us

Learn more about us.

Tomasz Lekawa

Internationally published Photographer

Cooperation with

Alicja Lekawa

(beauty cooperator)

Internationally published freelance Photomodel, Makeup Artist & Stylist

ATL PHOTOGRAPHY LTD was brought to life for the love of photography. Created in 2021 by Tomasz Lekawa- a portrait, editorial and boudoir photographer. His photographic works have been published in many magazines around the world. This includes publications in magazines from Australia, the USA, Canada, Brazil, the United Arab Emirates, France, Italy, Spain, Poland, Russia, Saudi Arabia, the United Kingdom, Greece, India and the Czech Republic. His works have also been published on the covers of magazines from New York, Paris Sydney, Toronto and more.

For more information about us, our work and publications, please visit our Portfolio website.

Portfolio

For more information about us and our work, please visit our portfolio website.

Portfolio

Pricing

Pick your perfect package

A standard photoshoot occurs when a photographed person or people wear the same outfit, makeup and hairstyle during the entire session. This type of photo session is the best choice for non-models who want to get beautiful images for their home photo album. Usually, the session lasts from 1 hour to 2 hours.

Available options:
  • 10 fully edited digital images - £179.00 - (inc. pre-paid £30.00)
  • 15 fully edited digital images - £229.00 (inc. pre-paid £30.00)
  • 20 fully edited digital images - £259.00 (inc. pre-paid £30.00)

We require a £30.00 photo session date and time booking fee (non-refundable).

We build our portfolio by creating a number of unique photographs. This type of photoshoot usually consists of a number of mini photo sessions where a model changes outfits, makeup and hairstyle. Then we select the best photos from the sets we did, and that is how your portfolio is created. This type of photo session is the best choice for aspiring models/photo models, semi-professional or professional models/photo models, influencers and anyone who wants to have their own portfolio.

Duration: ranging from 3 hours to a full day

Available options:
  • 10 fully edited digital images with up to 10 different outfits (professional makeup included) - £399.00
  • 15 fully edited digital images with up to 15 different outfits (professional makeup included) - £549.00
  • 20 fully edited digital images with up to 20 different outfits (professional makeup included) - £649.00

We require a 50% up-front fee and 50% payment once your portfolio is ready

This type of photoshoot is especially for professionals, business owners, self-employers, company directors, etc.

Priced individually depending on the project, its difficulty and time needed to finish the project.

This plan gives you constant and regular photography content for your Facebook & Instagram. This is the best choice for influencers, models, photo models, social media business owners and anyone who wants to keep the social media feed at its most professional look. You will receive your final images in two packages. One is ready to use on Instagram, while the other is ready to use on Facebook.

Available options:
  • FOUR SEASONS PHOTOSHOOT PLAN

    • We will photograph you 4 times. One time in each season of the year to create a series of professional images for you to use on your Facebook & Instagram. Photoshoots are made in Summer, Autumn, Winter and Spring. You pay just for 3 photoshoots (Standard or Portfolio)

  • ALL YEAR PHOTOSHOOTS PLAN

    • We will photograph you 12 times a year, which means 1 photoshoot every month. You pay just for 8 photoshoots (Standard or Portfolio).

Trips are in a group of 4 to 6 models plus a Photographer, Make-up Artist and Stylist.

Available options:
  • IN THE UK (in the most popular cities like London, Manchester, Liverpool, Leeds, Birmingham, Edinburgh, etc.).

    - Weekend trips, two nights stay in at least a 3-star hotel (accommodation included) - From £499.00 (per person, includes two Standard photo sessions with 10 digital images from each session. For 18+ only.)

  • IN EUROPE (Paris, Amsterdam, Brussels).

    - Weekend trips, 3 nights stay in at least a 3-star hotel with breakfast (transport from London & accommodation are included) - From £699.00 (per person)

    The price of £699.00 includes two Standard photo sessions with 10 digital images from each session. For 18+ only.

The normal time for the realisation of our orders is up to 6 weeks. This option is for those who need to get their photos ASAP, which means the next day until 11:59 pm (this option is only for orders up to 20 images - STANDARD or PORTFOLIO)

Available options:
  • up to 10 images - £99.00 on top of the price for a photoshoot
  • 10 to 15 images - £119.00 on top of the price for a photoshoot
  • 15 to 20 images - £129.00 on top of the price for a photoshoot

Please note that the Next Day Photos option is available only for single orders and is not for Photoshoot Trips. This additional option must be booked in advance.

Modelling with product presentations for shops, boutiques and individuals from the clothing and fashion industry. Priced individually depending on the project, its difficulty and time needed to finish the project.

Model: Alicja Lekawa
